sourcesContent:
const HomeVision = () => { return (
{/* */}

The FIRE Network Vision

An innovative step forward for passive income generation {/* */}
FIRE AIMS TO COMBINE REWARDS ACROSS 30+ YIELD PROTOCOLS

The idea of the FIRE project is to invest into many DeFi high-yield protocols, ensuring a managed portfolio across projects of varying risk.

MANAGED RISK WITH A BALANCED SET OF INVESTMENTS

FIRE will research and independently verify each protocol that will be invested in through an experienced team that eat, sleep, and dream about DeFi.

REDUCE FEES AND THE TIME SPENT CLICKING

The FIRE Network will move as one, and therefore its participants will be exposed to 30+ DeFi protocols without the network fees, the manual swapping, bridging, staking, bonding, etc.

{/* */}
Benefits for FIRE Network Members
Diversification
Lowered Risk
Less Fees
Less Hassle
Less Research
); } export default HomeVision;
